sourcesContent:
<template>
  <header :class="classes.header">
    <Container>
      <Typography variant="h1" :class="classes.title">
        Farming and Crop Delivery
      </Typography>
      <Typography variant="body1" :class="classes.description">
        Exploring the world of agriculture and direct-to-consumer crop delivery
      </Typography>
    </Container>
  </header>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';
import { Container, Typography } from '@vue/material';

export default defineComponent({
  components: {
    Container,
    Typography,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      classes: {
        header: {
          backgroundColor: '#333',
          color: '#fff',
          padding: '20px 0',
          textAlign: 'center',
        },
        title: {
          fontSize: '2rem',
          '@media(max-width: 600px)': {
            fontSize: '1.5rem',
          },
        },
        description: {
          fontSize: '1rem',
          '@media(max-width: 600px)': {
            fontSize: '0.9rem',
          },
        },
      },
    };
  },
});
</script>
